TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignedInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type SignedInfo = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 包含有关用于 XML 签名的规范化算法和签名算法的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 xml `` 数字签名规范定义的 xml 签名的元素。The class represents the `` element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ``元素是元素的子元素 `` ，它包含用于签名的规范化方法、用于签名和验证的算法以及描述数字签名的引用。The `` element, which is a subelement of the `` element, contains the canonicalization method used for signing, the algorithm used for signing and validation, and references that describe a digital signature. 对于大多数情况，应使用 属性中提供的类 对 XML 数字签名进行签名和验证。For most scenarios, you should use the class available from the property to sign and verify XML digital signatures. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CanonicalizationMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CanonicalizationMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为当前 对象签名前使用的规范化算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

value.span: 为当前 对象签名前使用的规范化算法。

span.span: The canonicalization algorithm used before signing for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用字符串统一资源标识符 (URI) 来表示 `` XML 数字签名的元素。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the `` element of an XML digital signature. 使用 属性来指定在 执行签名计算之前应用于类的 XML 输出的规范化算法。Use the property to specify the canonicalization algorithm applied to the XML output of the class before performing signature calculations. 使用下表中列出的具有此属性的 Uri 之一。Use one of the URIs listed in the following table with this property. |规范化方法Canonicalization Method|ValueValue| |-----------------------------|-----------| |规范 XMLCanonical XML|

这是默认方法。This is default method. 还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | |包含注释的规范 XMLCanonical XML with comments|

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | |独占规范 XMLExclusive Canonical XML|

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | |包含注释的独占规范 XMLExclusive Canonical XML with comments|

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).

summary.span: 获取用于规范化的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object used for canonicalization.

value.span: 用于规范化的 对象。

span.span: A object used for canonicalization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含类在 签名或验证之前用于规范化 XML 文档的对象。The property contains the object used by the class to canonicalize an XML document before signing or verifying. 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 可以 通过将所需的转换统一资源标识符 (URI) 传递给属性来修改此属性中的对象 。You can modify the object within this property by passing the desired transform Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the property.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As ArrayList
public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ References { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的 对象列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的 元素列表。

span.span: A list of the elements of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用 对象列表来表示 `` XML 数字签名的元素。The property uses a list of objects to represent the `` elements of an XML digital signature. 使用 属性可描述 XML 数字签名的转换、摘要算法和摘要值。Use the property to describe the transforms, digest algorithms, and digest values of an XML digital signature. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).

value.span: 当前 对象的签名长度。

span.span: The length of the signature for the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SignatureMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SignatureMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于当前 对象的签名生成和验证的算法名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

value.span: 算法名称，用于当前 对象的签名生成和验证。

span.span: The name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用字符串统一资源标识符 (URI) 来表示 `` XML 数字签名的元素。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represents the `` element of an XML digital signature. 使用 属性指定要用于生成和验证签名的算法。Use the property to specify the algorithm to use for signature generation and verification. 此属性标识创建 XML 数字签名所涉及的所有加密函数，包括哈希、公钥算法、消息身份验证代码 (Mac) 和填充。This property identifies all cryptographic functions involved in creating an XML digital signature, including hashing, public key algorithms, Message Authentication Codes (MACs), and padding. 使用下表中的其中一个 Uri 和此属性。Use one of the URIs in the following table with this property. |签名方法Signature Method|ValueValue| |----------------------|-----------| |HMAC-SHA1HMAC-SHA1|`http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#hmac-sha1`

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | |带有 SHA1 的 DSADSA with SHA1|`http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#dsa-sha1`

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | |具有 SHA1 的 RSARSA with SHA1|`http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1`

还在下面的静态字段中定义： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (W3C) [XML 签名语法和处理规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).
